title: India Today - Modi Sarkar Completed 100 Days -  Political crisis
description:
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

India Today - Modi Sarkar Completed 100 Days - Political crisis in Pakistan - [15 September, 2014]

|| HQ PDF || 130 Pages || English || 70 MB ||

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Highlights of India Today English issue dated September 15th, 2014. The Cover Story this week is on the hits and misses of the Narendra Modi government which recently completed its first 100 days in office. The National Interest column has Shekhar Gupta speaking about the foreign policy initiatives of Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The Big Story this week is on the continuing political crisis in Pakistan wherein PM Nawaz Sharif faces a grave threat to his office. The Nation section story on the BJP says rumours seem to be part of strategy to keep ministers under check. This week's Entertainment highlight is on the sudden surge of online humour videos that have left many in splits. The Special Report section focusses on the highly skewed distribution of rainfall this monsoon. Pro Kabaddi League has not only mainstreamed kabaddi at home but also made the Indian-flavoured sport cool worldwide. Read more about it in the Sport section. The issue has 3 free magazines - Woman, Simply Delhi and Simply Chennai - with it.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
